DOC.brief_title: Kid STRIDE : Exploring Participation Family-based Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: Children age 9-14 participate Kid STRIDE study family-based behavioral intervention obese child . Participants divide 3 group accord change weight : 1 ) child lose great 5 % body weight ; 2 ) child lose less 5 % body weight gain less 1 % body weight ; 3 ) child gain great 1 % body weight . We invite five family group 1 3 participate open-ended interview .
DOC.criteria: Completed 15week primary intervention phase Kid STRIDE
